wikipedia_page.main: Louisa Jennifer Fielden (born 20 December 1986) is a British film and television director, screenwriter and music video director.Louisa attended Worcester College, Oxford, where she graduated with first class honours in theology. Her short film, People You May Know, premiered at the 2018 Cannes Film Festival.

response: *Louisa Fielden (born 1983), British film director, screenwriter and producer
